## March 18, 2017
### Correlation between MPG and DISP in MTCARS data
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(mtcars, x=~mpg, y=~disp, mode="markers") 
```
